modName: Deadly Trio Sword Master Armor Retexture
summary: A Black Knight re-texture of Newermind43\'s Sword Master Armor.
descriptionHtml:
This mod is actually a fairly simple retex mod as I download the original Sword Master armor from the Deadly Trio mod from Newermind43, but I didn\'t really like the bronze armor look the original was.
So after a few minutes of some recoloring and changing texture paths on the nifs I came up with this black knight re-texture of the Sword Master armor.

SWORD MASTER ARMOR

Gender:Only Female

Armor Rating:

Cuirass - 40
Boots - 10
Gauntlets - 10
Mask - 8
Material - Elven

Location:
Fallowstone Cave(in chest)
Or use console to acquire

Requirements:
Deadly Trio (need the original files) http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37746//?
Ebony Armor - Download Black Variant (my retext using the ebony cube-maps from his mod) http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37487//?

Installation
Download and install the original mod here http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37746//?
Install the cube-maps from AMidianBorn Ebony here http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37487//?
Install my mod. Say yes to all overwrites.



Credits:
I\'d like to thank Newermind43 for allowing to publish this retexture and making his amazing armor.
Thanks to Cabal for publishing his ebony armor retexture for his cubemaps are very nice.
author: xEspada
